original_text: You will not join with wicked people. You will keep away from those who speak false things.
korean_text: 악한 자의 길과 패역을 말하는 자에게서 건져 내리라

sentences.original_text: You will not join with wicked people
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 악한 사람들과 함께하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: You will keep away from those
